title: Handwriting font
content:
Hi everrybody, i"m working on a campaing and I need some help to find out this font. Could anyone help me please!!!

thanks on advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Imagem2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202024744/http:/typophile.com/files/Imagem2_0.png) | 33.21 KB |
author: Pedro Henrique Gomes

comments.content:
These handwritten fonts have proliferated and are difficult to identify. I would suggest a suitable, robust alternative such as Lettre Éclatées from Panache, or Image Club's Litterbox.  
¡Suerte!
